name: ImageGenerator
0:
”Alexa, open image generator”
”Alexa, launch image generator”
”Alexa, ask image generator for help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: image generator
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Unleash your imagination with Image Generator! Harness A.I. to generate images directly from your mind! 
 
 Use the command Paint, and then describe the image you want to create (descriptive prompt)! The easiest and most impressive improvement you can make is to select a creation technique for your image. For example, it could be oil painting, pencil drawing, photo-realistic. You can also ask for the image to be created in the style of a famous artist like Picasso, Dali, or Van Gough. You can still do better by using some specific keywords. Try some of the following keywords in your instructions: Highly detailed, surrealist, smooth, sharp focus, matte, elegant, the most beautiful image ever seen, illustration, digital paint, dark, gloomy, 8k, 4k, washed colors, sharp, dramatic lighting, beautiful, picture of the day, ambient lighting, epic composition. You get the idea - so have fun and let your imagination go crazy! 
 
 Download your images and share your creations on socials and with friends! 
 
 CONTENT: This skill is moderated not to accept descriptive prompts that contain violence, sexual images, religious and political intolerance. It’s designed for you to have fun with - please keep it that way! 
 
 ***********FAIR USE POLICY: 
 
 We allow 3 free Image generations every 24 hours. We also give you two free downloads to begin. If you want to generate more images and more downloads you can buy an image pack containing more image generation and download tokens. 
 
 Refunds: Images are generated by advanced AI on the basis of your descriptive prompt. The skill provider has no control over this. If you are unhappy with the image generated, we do not consider this a reasonable refund request. We suggest that you try again and alter your descriptive prompts rather than repeatedly requesting refunds. We reserve the right to prohibit users from using the skill for misuse of refunds.
